name: Sexual Health Services
description: UCSF Alliance Health Project provides HIV testing, counseling, and treatment services. We offer limited STD testing (Syphilis, Oral and/or Rectal Chlamydia and Gonorrhea) for all male and transgender identified clients who have sex with men. Mobile testing, and Psychosocial support are also available.

howToGetIt: Schedule an appointment at https://alliancehealthproject.ucsf.edu/sexual-health-services during the following times: The first Tuesday of each month the schedule is modified for administration and organization meetings. Check the schedule for available appointments. Tuesday - Thursday Appointment times: 10am - 6:30pm Walk-ins: 10am - 6:30pm Friday Appointment times: 9am - 4:30pm Saturday Appointment times: 9am - 12pm, 2 - 4pm Walk-ins: 9am - 12pm, 2 - 4pm Please call 415.502.TEST to speak with our Sexual Health team to check for availability or email: sexualhealthservices.ahp@ucsf.edu.
